sentence.Network_en: He was the Minotaur in a canvas - and - paper labyrinth of his own construction.

sentence.Network_en: To rescue the beautiful princess Ariadne, from her terrible Minotaur world.

sentence.Network_en: If you go in now, you can kill the Minotaur while he is sleeping.
